general.gigTitle: design and develop your custom wordpress website

sellerCard.oneLiner: An Award Winning Full Scale Digital Marketing Agency
sellerCard.description: Welcome to Rank Harvest! We're a team that thrives on hard work, and we pride ourselves in our commitment to delivering unparalleled results. With over 20 years of experience in corporate Digital Marketing, our founder & CEO Mike has worked for brands like Sony, AIG, and the NFL. Our agency is composed of a diverse group of talented individuals, with the end goal of establishing trust and connection—both between us and our clients, and between brands and their audiences. We offer a suite of digital services including SEO, Google Ads, Social Media Marketing, and Website Development & Design.

description.content:
Looking for a 100% custom built Wordpress website? You've come to the right place!


We are Rankharvest - a Top Rated Digital Marketing Agency. We have years of experience designing & developing Wordpress sites, and are now offering our website building services here on Fiverr! We'll ensure your custom built site is optimized for lightning fast load speeds and excellent SEO. We use Elemetor Pro as our website builder to ensure you'll always be able to update your own site, no matter your technical skill level. And best of all, we work fast!


  • We'll create a beautiful design in any niche
  • Responsive, will load perfectly on any device
  • QA testing and security scans before launch
  • Built-in CTA & conversion rate optimization
  • Plugins and functionality based on your needs
  • Need help with hosting? No problem!


Our Process:


  • We work with you to understand your requirements
  • Create a stunning design from scratch, or show us a few websites that inspire you
  • See your fully functional website before going live
  • Continued support, even after your order is completed!


So we can discuss your requirements, please message us before ordering!

slide.name: design and develop your custom wordpress website
design and develop your custom wordpress website
design and develop your custom wordpress website

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need from me to begin working on my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To get started, we'll need your hosting/Wordpress admin access including your site's Logo, Contents, Images (if any), and videos. We'll also require your company address along with the email, name, and number for the contact page and contact form setup.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide Domain & Hosting?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We do not offer Domain & Hosting - you would be responsible for purchasing these yourself. We are happy to provide you with cost-effective & efficient high quality suggestions if you need help deciding which hosting plan to go with!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I show you some websites for references?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes - we're happy to take a look at any websites you have in mind that inspire you. We can even do our best to try and replicate other website designs - but keep in mind we may not be able to clone all of their functions since each site has their own logic.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to edit my website on my own after it's created?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! Elementor is one of the fastest growing website tools due to its ease of use no-coding required drag-and-drop features. All you'd need to do is open the editor and make whatever changes you'd like - but if you ever have any questions after your order is complete feel free to reach out!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide any SEO or Speed Optimization Services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes - we offer both of these services as add-ons. Along with website building, our agency specializes in SEO, and have helped hundreds of businesses rank their keywords. Our speed optimizations services will ensure your site loads under 3 seconds.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide custom designs?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes - all of our Wordpress websites are built fully custom

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide the content for the site as well?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: If you don't have any images for your site, we will use standard stock imagery. In terms of written content - we will use standard Lorem Ipsum filler text unless you provide us with your own written content.

reviews.comment: These Guys Are Amazing, I have used Rank Harvest Over and Over Again and They could not be any BETTER!! and Their Customer Service is 2nd to None! I would and have recommended Them to everyone I know. Take it From Me CHOOSE RANK HARVEST!!
Know what they doing  fast good courteous, patient professional after so many attempts dealing with other entities on this site. It’s the first one that I get proper service and professionalism.

Rank Harvest did an AMAZING job with my website development! Their code expertise and attention to details resulted in flawless delivery. Plus, their quick responsiveness and deep understanding made the whole process smooth and enjoyable 👍.

Rank Harvest consistently DELIVERS impeccable websites and landing pages, always on time or even ahead of schedule. Their attention to detail and proactive communication make working with them a breeze, ensuring a bug-free and EXCEEDED expectations experience. Highly recommended for exemplary service in website development! 👍

Rank Harvest impressed with their top-tier professionalism, attention to detail, and exceptional code expertise in website development. Their quick responsiveness, politeness, and high level of cooperation made them a pleasure to work with.

reviews_snippet.comment: Starting a business of any kind is often times and arduous and daunting task.  There are so many variables that are in a constant flux.  Often times, the process is borderline system overload.  When it came time for me to develop a web page; I was at a complete loss.  I came to Fiverr, researched the creators, and found Ranked Harvest. For me, I've been in the planning phase for some time so that when I am ready, I can hit the ground running.  Brass tacks, Ranked Harvest throughout the whole process, delivered quality for value while maintaining consistent friendly, professional, and patient, communication.  I'm so thankful for their services and definitely recommend to friends, family, and the rest of the world.
Wow! This Seller is Probably the Best I have ever used on Fiverr and I have done over 400 Gigs. I will continue to use these guys whenever I can. Just Amazing to work with

This project is easily one of the best experiences we have had on Fiverr in a long time. They set expectations quickly and delivered on time and without hassle. When there were things to correct, they did so without issue. Wow!

sSmply the best company I have worked with on Fiverr and the best devolper I have worked with to date outside of this.

Their attention to detail and responsiveness were exceptional. Couldn't recommend more
They were extremely helpful in guiding me to built what we needed. They laid out clear and concise instructions! Fantastic to deal with

notableClients.name: Google
notableClients.interaction_description: After spending many years in digital marketing for solar, I was consulted by Google on how to improve their Accelerator program for renewable energy startups.  This involved multiple meetings with Google staff along with research and analytics.

enriched_details.name: Google
enriched_details.description: Google LLC is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products, which include online advertising technologies, a search engine, cloud computing, software, and hardware.

notableClients.name: Fiverr
notableClients.interaction_description: I gave a monthly webinar hosted by Fiverr called “Supercharged Tips and Tricks from a Top Rated Seller” to educate new sellers how get sales & delight customers.  I am also a Fiverr San Diego Community leader where I continue to help others.

enriched_details.name: Fiverr
enriched_details.description: Fiverr's mission is to change how the world works together. Fiverr connects businesses with freelancers offering digital services in 300+ categories.

notableClients.name: Sony
notableClients.interaction_description: I was contracted by Sony as a web developer and SEO specialist to help with the European launch of the Playstation.  I wrote the SEO strategy for their eCommerce store, the Playstation Store, and coded the UI for much of the account creation flow.

enriched_details.name: Sony
enriched_details.description: Sony Group Corporation is a Japanese multinational conglomerate corporation headquartered in Kōnan, Minato, Tokyo.

notableClients.name: Huawei
notableClients.interaction_description: Huawei hired Rankharvest to provide content writing and off-page SEO for their consumer electronics division targeting Saudi Arabia, France and the UK. We were successful in increasing organic rank and traffic, resulting in Huawei ordering 3 times.

enriched_details.name: Huawei
enriched_details.description: Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. designs, develops, and sells telecommunications equipment and consumer electronics.
